title: Looking for this font or something really close.
content:
Just the font style, not really worried about the embossed or button effect.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SIMXPERENCE_4548.jpg)

Font: 

 SOFACHROME 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072025/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: wannab1

comments.content:
Sofachrome, the italic version, by Typodermic:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/sofachrome.font?fpp=50&text=SIMXPERIENCE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072025/http:/www.dafont.com/sofachrome.font?fpp=50&text=SIMXPERIENCE "http://www.dafont.com/sofachrome.font?fpp=50&text=SIMXPERIENCE")
